duties_responsibilities.duty: Managing R&D Spend for product roadmap.
Performing ROI analysis on current and future engineering investments.
Working closely with project managers to track and forecast spend to help make accounting judgments.
Prepare quarter-end journal entries and any necessary reporting functions.
Collecting, analyzing, and reporting on our quarterly expense, headcount and capital budgets.
Consistently improving processes to improve spending predictability.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or Finance
